message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price, and I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $18,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value is $15,000 to you.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle at $19,000? This price reflects the true value of the product.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $17,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value is $15,000 to you.
